properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shirassu nitchitivi mundla makutamukai Swaamy naa paapamula korake Sahimpa jaalani vedana bahugaa Sahinchitivi prema thoda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kannula nitchitivi kanneeru kaarcha Karuninchi naa stitini joochi Karige nee hrudayam dukkhambu thoda Kadu vedanatho yedchitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Koradaa debbalache nee deha Mantha chaaraluga dunna badenu Shareera mantha rakhtamaya maaye Varadaa gaayamu londitivaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaallu chetulalo mekulu gottiri Ballemutho prakkan bodichiri Yelaagu vivarinthu nee baadha nenu Orchitivaa mounamu vahinchi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prayashchittambai potivaa naakai Paapamu nundi vidipinchutaku Ponditi nentho goppa rakshananu Pashchaatapamu dwaaraa nenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Entha adbuthamu prabhuvaa nee Prema endukinthagaa preminchitivi Vandana marpinthu nee paadamulake Ponduga nee vaada naithi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa yedala needu sankalpamegaa Nee swaastya manubhavinchutaku Nee thoda niratham nenundu natlu Nee yadhikaaram bitchitivi{/lang-eng}
